org.diet4j.inclasspath

Class InClasspathModuleRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.diet4j.core.ModuleRegistry
      • org.diet4j.core.AbstractModuleRegistry
        • org.diet4j.core.AbstractScanningModuleRegistry
          • org.diet4j.inclasspath.InClasspathModuleRegistry

  • public class InClasspathModuleRegistry
extends AbstractScanningModuleRegistry
    A (mock) ModuleRegistry when all Modules are on the class path.

      • createClassLoader

        public ClassLoader createClassLoader(Module module,
                                     ClassLoader parentClassLoader)
        ModuleRegistry also acts as a factory for the Modules' ClassLoaders. Here, all Modules share the same ClassLoaders.
        Overrides:
        createClassLoader in class AbstractModuleRegistry
        Parameters:
        module - the Module for which to create a ClassLoader
        parentClassLoader - the ClassLoader to use as the parent ClassLoader
        Returns:
        the ClassLoader to use with the Module

      • findModuleMetas

        protected static HashMap<String,ModuleMeta[]> findModuleMetas(ClassLoader cl)
                                                       throws IOException
        Find the ModuleMetas available to this ClassLoader.
        Parameters:
        cl - the class loader
        Returns:
        the found ModuleMetas, keyed by module name, and ordered by version
        Throws:
        IOException - reading files failed
